}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== PrismGT FullMAC, other revisions are not FullMAC
The subsystem of this card is a duplication of the main ID (10b7:6001).
Additional specifications, per '''3Com''''s datasheet for this product family, follow...
{{802dot11 RxSens|11b |1M=-89.9 |2M=-89.9 |5.5M=-88.8 |11M=-82.8 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-88 |9M=-88.5 |12M=-85.6 |18M=-85.4 |24M=-79.8 |36M=-78.8 |48M=-69.6 |54M=-67.6 }}
